Ok so I figured out what was happening.

I'm using sway-wm which is a tilling wm. If I include `AbstractPlotting.inline!(true)` then it works fine and saves. If I make Makie plots floating then it works fine as well. It's just when the plot is forced to be a certain size due to sway's tilling that I get the error
